Text: Who is this lady! Where did she say all this! And look at the Reporters they too seem to be agreeing with her words and giving her more hateful ideas . None of them had the audacity to call her out and tell her Madam! you are a disgrace to humanity

There is a connection between the disastrous approach to Covid19 in the UK and the Brexit issue. The connection is the people - the same people made and are making the policy decisions. We must extend transition now - in reality only three weeks left. #extendtransition

BREAKING: Ontario ombudsman launches investigation into gov'ts oversight of nursing homes devastated by the #COVID19 pandemic with at least 1,648 deaths. Ombud Paul Dube says last week's military medical report painted a "stunning portrait" of horrific conditions. #onpoli
